title: Leaver Buster Punishment Needs a Fix
body:
I don't agree with the current state of the Leaver Buster system, recently, I must admit that I have left a couple of games to get my first leaver buster punishment. I played my 5 games, wasting a total of 25 minutes being in queue when I could be playing with my friends. I play about 10 games, when then, I get a internet blackout where it's my internet provider's fault. Even though I've played 10 games, which is quite a fair amount per se, I get yet another punishment of 10 minutes extended queue time for 5 games. I played those 5 games, a total of 50 minutes wasted. 

The next time, after playing around about 15 games, guess what? Firewall error, I have to keep trying to get past it, I have to log out, restart my computer, fix my firewall when I realise restarting my computer doesn't help and then I finally try to reconnect. And I do, but yet, I get another queue time ban. Of 20 minutes. For 5 games. That's a total of 1 hour and 40 minutes sitting in queue. Doing nothing. 

This type of punishment which leaver buster gives might help people try and not leave the game, in some cases, but to those who want to play the game, when they have less time to play as each year passes by, they want to just play it for fun. For the fun of it. Waiting in queue isn't fun. It's discouraging.

 I think it honestly that if something isn't changed, people who are affected by 20 minute queues might quit playing LoL. the amount of time waiting in queue is just undeniably too long.
